channel.title: [317] scapeness v1.0 [317]
channel.description:
[size=14pt][/size]OK well, this is just the server I've been working on for a while now... just thought I should release it or something, let you guys get people, cuz i can't lol. Alright, let me just say, idk if you would consider it leeched, i just don't think so. If it is sorry, I will remove it. But please remember this is my first release and i'm pretty much a novice, but i try my best so, here it is :) [size=16pt] Let me give you the download links in advance :) MEDIAFIRE - [url=http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?2ygt5tm12no]http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?2ygt5tm12no[/url] MEGAUPLOAD - [url=http://www.megaupload.com/?d=4SIYRDK1]http://www.megaupload.com/?d=4SIYRDK1[/url][/size]
[size=14pt]OK for some commands here *NOTE* there are more![/size] [size=10pt]~~PLAYER COMMANDS~~ ::skills ::home ::shops ::train ::gwd ::slayer ::dbmini ::arrows ::pkcircle
and many, many, many more.
~~Moderator Commands~~ ::master ::pure ::pnpc ::food ::mouse
and many more.
~~Administrator Commands~~ ::god ::npc (::normal) ::pring ::1hit ::banuser ::xteleto (::xteletome)
and many more.
~~Owner Commands~~ ::xteleall ::giveadmin ::givemod ::demote ::giveowner ::eat ::z0r
Those are only a selected few commands that I listed. Like I stated, there are many many more.[/size]
[size=16pt]Now for some PICTURES.. you know if they work. idk never done this.[/size]
[size=12pt]OK Here is the home, not created by me, but I weed I (the owner of stabbingscape)[/size] [img]http://i793.photobucket.com/albums/yy218/7111816/PICTURE1.jpg[/img]
[size=12pt]Alright now, here is teh train that I coded with my bare hands... lol.[/size] [img]http://i793.photobucket.com/albums/yy218/7111816/PICTURE2.jpg[/img]
[size=12pt]Here is a custom GWD made by me also[/size] [img]http://i793.photobucket.com/albums/yy218/7111816/PICTURE3.jpg[/img]
[size=12pt]Now for the pk circle. Coded by me![/size] [img]http://i793.photobucket.com/albums/yy218/7111816/PICTURE4.jpg[/img]
[size=12pt]And the shops...[/size] [img]http://i793.photobucket.com/albums/yy218/7111816/PICTURE5.jpg[/img]
[size=12pt]Regular pkz.. ::PK[/size] [img]http://i793.photobucket.com/albums/yy218/7111816/PICTURE6.jpg[/img]
[size=12pt]Skills[/size] [img]http://i793.photobucket.com/albums/yy218/7111816/PICTURE7.jpg[/img]
[size=12pt]KBD area[/size] [img]http://i793.photobucket.com/albums/yy218/7111816/PICTURE8.jpg[/img]
[size=12pt]and finally! last and probably least... no jk. Rock! coded by me!! made of rock/earth npcs. quite cool if you ask me![/size] [img]http://i793.photobucket.com/albums/yy218/7111816/PICTURE10.jpg[/img]
[size=12pt]OK so that's pretty much it... well no it's not, for the rest of it, you must download the source, you know. It took me quite a while, and patients to make this server, so plz don't dis it up too bad, because remember it is my first release.
Now i will try credits, but idk how accurate they are. ok i'm ganna have to say 45% me i think 35% I weed I and... 20% owner of czar base, not really sure lol..
I think that's accurate? if not sorry lol i tried, i tried..[/size]
[size=14pt]Just in case you missed the links... MEDIAFIRE - [url=http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?2ygt5tm12no]http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?2ygt5tm12no[/url] MEGAUPLOAD - [url=http://www.megaupload.com/?d=4SIYRDK1]http://www.megaupload.com/?d=4SIYRDK1[/url][/size]
